quoteText:
Apple reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to change, modify, add or remove portions of these Terms of Use, at any time.
It is your responsibility to check these Terms of Use periodically for changes.
Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes will mean that you accept and agree to the changes.
title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: Apple may change their Terms of Use at any time and it is your responsibility to keep up to date on these changes. By using the site you accept these terms.
